channel.title: A few question
channel.description:
hi i got 3 or 2 questions how do i edit the lvl 0 rights im usin mopar client and when the rank is 0 for somebody they can yell is there somehow i can edit this i dont think moparscape comes with a client cause i searched it and dident come up also i want to know how to edit the ::char it works when typed in but i cant accept the change and heres a few other things how do i add items that arent in the game like skill capes and dragon boots it would be helpfull if someone can give me a code to do this
i also want to know how to edit the login screen from mopar to my own,and that is it i am femmileier a tiny bit with client and stuff i know how to add spawning creatures add shop items and stuff i would like to add fishing to my game two again it would be helpfull if someone can give me scrips or tell me really well how to do some of this
also really nooby question im makin a private server i registered it but wen i try to go on it with the ip adress it doesent work even when i press start new server or watever
thanks, ultimatepker :D
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 07, 2008, 12:40:54 PM[/size][hr]can someone help i really need this questions answered

item.title: A few question

hi i got 3 or 2 questions how do i edit the lvl 0 rights im usin mopar client and when the rank is 0 for somebody they can yell is there somehow i can edit this i dont think moparscape comes with a client cause i searched it and dident come up also i want to know how to edit the ::char it works when typed in but i cant accept the change and heres a few other things

i also want to know how to edit the login screen from mopar to my own,and that is it i am femmileier a tiny bit with client and stuff i know how to add spawning creatures add shop items and stuff i would like to add fishing to my game two again it would be helpfull if someone can give me scrips or tell me really well how to do some of this
